actions.api package¶

Submodules¶

actions.api.Car_API module¶

class actions.api.Car_API.Car_API¶

Bases: object

Car_API is the entry point of car actions.

getBodyTypes()¶

Endpoint to get all the body types of cars.

Returns

a list of body types of cars

getCarsWithparams()¶

Endpoint to get car details with indicated conditions

Returns

a list of cars with indicated conditions

getColors()¶

Endpoint to get all the color of cars.

Returns

a list of color of cars

getMakes()¶

Endpoint to get all car manufacturer.

Returns

a list of manufacturer

getSeatNumbers()¶

Endpoint to get all seat numbers.

Returns

a list of seat numbers

getWholeCars()¶

Endpoint to get all car details.

Returns

a list of all the car details

actions.api.Record_API module¶

class actions.api.Record_API.Record_API¶

Bases: object

Record_API organises all the functions which are related to book cars.

book()¶

Endpoint to book a car

Returns

the result of booking operation

cancel_booking()¶

Endpoint to cancel a booking

Returns

the result of canceling a booking

checkRecord()¶

Endpoint to check whether the user has booked or rented a car

Returns

If the user can book a new car, return True; otherwise, return False

getRecords()¶

Endpoint to get the records of the user

Returns

a list of records of the user

actions.api.User_API module¶

class actions.api.User_API.User_API¶

Bases: object

User_API organises all the functions which are related to user operation.

checkUserName()¶

Endpoint to check whether the username is taken.

Returns

if the username is ok to use, return True; otherwise, return False

login()¶

Endpoint to login.

Returns

the user information

register()¶

Endpoint to register.

Returns

the user information
